= Setting Up The Application =

  # Create a new Android Project called '`NotepadExample`', select the Build Target 'Android 2.3.3' (API level 10).
  # Download the latest distribution of Infinitum Framework from the [http://code.google.com/p/infinitum-framework/downloads/list downloads page].
  # Add the Infinitum JAR and the Dexmaker dependency to the application's build path.
  # In order to provide framework support, we will extend one of Infinitum's Activities. In this case, make `NotepadExampleActivity` extend `InfinitumListActivity`.
